segments.text: Daddy , what's next ? What else do we do now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is a man-made fishing pond nearby . So , What do you think of going fishing there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . Let's go . Where is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Patience , boy . A watched pot never boils . We shall get out fishing stuff first and make some baits , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have many cookies left here . Can we use them as baits ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think fish would like them . Instead , they love earth worms .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So let's go and catch earth worms !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I think that's enough for today . Let's go .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Daddy , do you think we're gonna catch any fish today ? We've been fishing here for more than two hours , and we get nothing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's because you're talking to me all the time . Be patient , or there will be no chance to have sashimi for dinner today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I love sashimi . Did mom bring any soy sauce for that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I suppose she did . Be quiet . There is a fish on the hook . Here it is . Look , a big one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Cool . Hey , I've got an idea . Why don't we cook it separately ? Half for sashimi , and the other half for grill .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great idea . But the fact is we have no barbecue with us . Moreover , the sashimi will be great . So why do we bother to waste time on barbecuing the fish ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , all right . There is nothing to complain about .
segments.speaker: S1
